I'm a volunteer DJ at WFMU radio, broadcasting from Jersey City NJ on-air and online. I'm on Wednesdays from noon-3pm Eastern time; I play lesser-known catchy records, new (mostly) and old, rock (mostly) and not.

I like and may post about new and old post-punk, proto-punk, regular punk, power pop, classic disco, cats, baseball, the Kids In The Hall, the NYT Crossword, and other stuff.

I'm the boss of this here server.
